item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好科技股正在崛起。特斯拉希望抓紧时间生产更便宜的车型。日本正在密切关注日元走势。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Tech stocks are roaring back. Tesla wants to hurry up and build cheaper models. And Japan is keeping very close tabs on the yen. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 石油保持涨势，库存数据和伊朗制裁成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于一份行业报告显示美国原油库存缩减，以及交易商追踪对伊朗实施新制裁的进展，石油保持了涨势。【原文：Oil held a gain as an industry report showed shrinking US crude stockpiles and traders tracked progress toward fresh sanctions against Iran.】

item.title: 特斯拉提振美国科技巨头，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在美国科技股大涨之后，亚洲股市将高开，华尔街投资者将科技股的高收益视为对股市牛市的重大考验。【原文：Stocks in Asia were set to open higher after a US rally in tech heavyweights, whose high-stakes earnings are being seen by Wall Street investors as a major test of the bull run in equities.】

item.title: 中国石油买家将经受住美国对伊朗更严格制裁的考验
item.description: 中国的私营炼油企业可能会寻求购买更多来源不明的货物，因为他们正准备应对美国对伊朗出口的新制裁，以确保原油继续流向世界第一大进口国。【原文：China’s private oil refiners could seek to buy more cargoes whose origin has been obscured as they prepare for fresh US sanctions on Iranian exports, ensuring crude continues to flow to the world’s top importer.】

item.title: 福特斯库铁矿石发货量因脱轨和天气原因下降 6
item.description: 全球第四大铁矿石开采商 Fortescue Ltd. 称，2024 年前三个月的炼钢原料出货量同比下降了 6%，反映了去年年底矿车出轨事故以及天气干扰的影响。【原文：Fortescue Ltd., the world’s fourth-biggest iron ore miner, said shipments of the steelmaking material in 2024’s first three months fell 6% from the year before, reflecting the impact of an ore car derailment at the end of last year along with weather disruptions.】

item.title: 黄金创纪录的涨势可能源于中国的狂热
item.description: 黄金今年创纪录的涨势令市场观察家们困惑不已，因为金银在本应受阻的逆风中却一路走高。本周金价下跌，原因可能在于中国。【原文：Gold’s record-setting rally this year has puzzled market watchers as bullion has roared higher despite headwinds that should have held it back. With prices sagging this week, the explanation may lie in China.】

item.title: 中国监管引发企业分红潮
item.description: 中国公司越来越多地提高股息支付率，这表明监管部门推动提高股东回报的努力正在取得成效。【原文：Chinese companies are increasingly bumping up their dividend payouts, a sign that a regulatory push for higher shareholder returns is bearing fruit.】

item.title: 印尼盾暴跌可能使印尼央行在 2025 年前暂缓降息
item.description: 印尼央行可能会将宽松货币政策推迟到今年晚些时候，甚至是2025年初，因为它要等待美联储利率路径的不确定性和中东战事的持续。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank will likely postpone monetary easing to later this year, if not early 2025, as it waits out uncertainty around the Federal Reserve’s rate path and the continued fighting in the Middle East.】

item.title: 马维克斯的鲁弗洛警告特鲁多增税后资本外逃
item.description: 加拿大一位著名的技术投资者加入了加拿大企业批评总理贾斯汀-特鲁多提高资本利得税决定的阵营，认为这将导致资本外逃。【原文：A prominent Canadian technology investor joined the chorus of Canadian businesses criticizing Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s decision to raise the capital-gains tax, arguing it will cause capital flight from the country.】

item.title: 智利国营贷款机构为潜在的 AT1 美元债券销售招募银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，智利国家银行已聘请银行为可能出售的附加一级美元债券安排投资者电话会议。【原文：Banco del Estado de Chile has hired banks to arrange investor calls for the potential sale of Additional Tier 1 dollar bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: EQT 下调销售预期，计划在 5 月前削减产量
item.description: 由于需求疲软，天然气价格徘徊在四年低点附近，美国最大的天然气生产商 EQT 公司目前正在采取减产措施，直至 5 月份。该公司还下调了 2024 年的销售指导。【原文：EQT Corp., the largest US producer of natural gas, is now taking output cuts through May as prices hover near four-year lows because of weak demand. The company also reduced its sales guidance for 2024.】

item.title: LME 通过新规则打击交易商的俄罗斯金属游戏
item.description: 本月早些时候对俄罗斯金属实施制裁后，出现了一个利润丰厚而又复杂的交易机会，伦敦金属交易所针对金属在其仓储网络中的流动实施了新的规则。【原文：The London Metal Exchange is imposing new rules surrounding the movement of metal in its warehousing network, taking aim at a lucrative and complex trading opportunity that emerged after the imposition of sanctions on Russian metal earlier this month.】

item.title: 微软支持的 Rubrik 首次公开募股超额认购 20 倍
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士称，由微软公司支持的云计算和数据安全初创公司Rubrik Inc.计划首次公开发行股票，目前已获得的订单数量约为现有股票数量的20倍。【原文：Rubrik Inc., a cloud and data security startup backed by Microsoft Corp., has drawn about 20 times as many orders for its planned initial public offering as there are available shares, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 支付公司 Cielo 投票后更接近在巴西退市
item.description: 由巴西最大的两家贷款机构控制的巴西支付公司 Cielo SA 正在向股票退市迈出一步。【原文：Cielo SA, the Brazilian payments company controlled by two of the country’s largest lenders, is taking a step toward delisting its stock.】

item.title: 交易员增持美联储今年将跳过降息的赌注
item.description: 美国利率市场的交易商已经开始押注美联储今年将不会削减借贷成本。【原文：Traders in the US interest-rates market have started to put on wagers that the Federal Reserve will refrain from cutting borrowing costs this year.】

item.title: 面对廉价钢铁进口，巴西加入保护主义浪潮
item.description: 在以中国为首的廉价进口产品大量涌入的情况下，巴西正在加强对本国钢铁制造商的保护，对 11 种合金产品实施进口配额制度。【原文：Brazil is stepping up protections for its steelmakers amid an influx of cheap imports led by China, by imposing an import quota system on 11 types of alloy products.】

item.title: 佩雷尔曼的 Vericast 公司就债务出售条款与贷款人发生争执
item.description: 据知情人士透露，罗纳德-佩雷尔曼（Ronald Perelman）的威瑞卡斯特公司（Vericast Corp.）因计划将其数字和印刷营销部门出售给当纳利父子公司（R.R. Donnelley & Sons Co.【原文：Ronald Perelman’s Vericast Corp. is facing pushback from lenders over debt terms tied to plans to sell its digital and print marketing division to R.R. Donnelley & Sons Co., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 消费者信用卡消费增长，Visa 利润上升 17
item.description: 随着美国信用卡消费的攀升，Visa 公司公布的季度利润超过了华尔街的预测。【原文：Visa Inc. reported a quarterly profit that beat Wall Street predictions as US credit-card spending climbed.】

item.title: 高盛股价上涨，创 2021 年以来首个历史新高
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. shares rose to a record on Tuesday, eclipsing their previous closing high set more than two years ago.】

item.title: 如果不能尽快达成收购协议，快递公司将面临清算风险
item.description: Express Inc. 表示，如果破产的服装零售商不能较快完成拟议的收购，该公司可能被迫清算。【原文：Express Inc. said it could be forced to liquidate if the bankrupt clothing retailer can’t complete a proposed buyout relatively quickly.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会正在与企业商谈成为美国国库清算中心事宜
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）正在与寻求成为美国国债和衍生品交易中央清算所的公司进行谈判，新的机构规则旨在强化全球最大的债务市场。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission is in talks with firms seeking to become central clearinghouses for US Treasuries and derivatives trading under a new agency rule designed to fortify the world’s largest debt market.】

item.title: 谨慎的英伟达交易员关注财报前的看涨期权交易
item.description: 用期权对冲 Nvidia 公司股价大幅波动的成本很高，但衍生品交易商正受到诱惑，在该股大幅反弹之际卖出合约以赚取额外收益。【原文：Hedging against big swings in Nvidia Corp.’s share price with options is expensive, but derivatives traders are being tempted to sell contracts to earn some extra yield as the stock corrects its massive rally.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊不再大胆看涨 S&P 500 指数
item.description: 随着美国经济和企业盈利的问题不断涌现，摩根士丹利的迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）正在回避他在过去几年中闻名遐迩的大盘看涨，转而专注于寻找表面之下的机会。【原文：With questions swirling around the US economy and corporate earnings, Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson is avoiding the kinds of big market calls he became known for the past couple years to focus instead on finding opportunities beneath the surface.】

item.title: CVC探索110亿欧元收购制药商Recordati的可能性
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，CVC Capital Partners 正在为其持有的意大利制药商 Recordati SpA 的控股权寻求各种选择。【原文：CVC Capital Partners is exploring options for its controlling stake in Italian drugmaker Recordati SpA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西电力公司获债券持有人批准出售 Cteep 股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西电力公司 Centrais Eletricas Brasileiras SA（又称 Eletrobras）获得了债券持有人的批准，将公开出售其在 ISA Cteep-Companhia de Transmissão de Elétrica Energia Paulista 公司的股份。【原文：Centrais Eletricas Brasileiras SA, a Brazilian power company known as Eletrobras, obtained bondholders’ approval to carry out a public share sale of its stake in ISA Cteep-Companhia de Transmissão de Elétrica Energia Paulista, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国拍卖创纪录，需求强劲，国债保持涨势
item.description: 在美国财政部创纪录规模的两年期国债拍卖会上，美国国债需求强劲，保持了涨势。【原文：US government debt held gains amid solid demand for the US Treasury’s record-sized auction of two-year notes — even as a much-desired 5% coupon proved elusive.】

item.title: 据说赛诺菲将要求银行为 200 亿美元的场外分拆进行投标
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国制药商赛诺菲已要求银行为其消费者保健业务的分拆投标，这是今年欧洲可能发生的最大交易之一。【原文：French drugmaker Sanofi has asked banks to pitch for roles on the separation of its consumer-health business, according to people familiar with the matter, one of the biggest deals likely to happen in Europe this year.】

item.title: 俄罗斯预测输华天然气价格将低于输欧价格
item.description: 事实证明，与以前依赖向欧洲市场西行输送天然气相比，俄罗斯重点加强对中国的天然气出口并不那么有利可图。【原文：Russia’s focus on boosting natural gas exports to China is proving less lucrative for the nation than its former reliance on westbound deliveries to European markets.】

item.title: Temenos 任命新首席执行官，称销售额受卖空报告影响
item.description: 今年早些时候被做空机构盯上的金融软件公司 Temenos AG，在激进分子一再要求撤换临时首席执行官 Andreas Andreades 后，宣布了新的首席执行官人选。【原文：Temenos AG, the financial software company targeted by a short seller report earlier this year, announced its new chief executive officer after repeated activist calls to replace interim CEO Andreas Andreades.】

item.title: 高盛与私人信贷公司就 Beyond Meat Capital 进行谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has held conversations with private credit lenders to help shore up Beyond Meat Inc.’s liquidity, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
